text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum latiflorum is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is endemic to Brazil.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Solanum latiflorum". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T35461A9934183. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T35461A9934183.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
